Posts.Content: Hi there is a look Good Feel Better workshop in York hospital. Call 01904 721166 and you should be able to book a place. Take it easy and rest up following your surgery. I am in Lincoln and planning to go to a workshop here. Xx
Posts.Title: 'Look good, feel better' session

Posts.Content: Hi Staffy I wonder what hospital you are at that gives out a voucher for the wig. I am at Harrogate. Best wishes Esther
Posts.Title: Wig voucher.

Posts.Content: Hi Vicky I just sent Staffy a note asking which hospital she was at that gives out the 60 pound voucher before I realised I had emailed the wrong person, what a dork. If the wig you choose is more than the Â£60 do you pay the over spend to the shop? I am at Harrogate now but started my journey at Lincoln. I am a few years down the line now and doing well. I am asking for a friend who is starting her journey.. Take Care Esther
Posts.Title: Wig voucher.
